shell: cd ${DOWNLOAD_LOCATION} && composer update 2>&1 && composer install 2>&1 && composer dump-autoload 2>&1

install.title: Install tSuite
install.description: Copies the files to the install location

shell: cp -r ${DOWNLOAD_LOCATION}/src/* ${INSTALL_LOCATION} && echo "No errors while copying from ${DOWNLOAD_LOCATION}/src/* to ${INSTALL_LOCATION}" || "There was a problem copying the files from ${DOWNLOAD_LOCATION}/src/* to ${INSTALL_LOCATION}"

mkdir ${INSTALL_LOCATION}/vendor; cp -r ${DOWNLOAD_LOCATION}/vendor/* ${INSTALL_LOCATION}/vendor && echo "No errors while copying from ${DOWNLOAD_LOCATION}/vendor/* to ${INSTALL_LOCATION}/vendor" || "There was a problem copying the files from ${DOWNLOAD_LOCATION}/vendor/* to ${INSTALL_LOCATION}/vendor"

setupDB.title: Setup MySQL Database
setupDB.description: This test drops the MySQL database if it exists, creates a new database, creates the user and grants the permissions to the user.
